H0.text: Earth's magnetic field has changed over the last 200 years primarily due to human activity.

H1.text: The frequency of earthquakes has changed over the last 200 years primarily due to human activity.

H2.text: Earth's tectonic plate activity has changed over the last 200 years primarily due to human activity.

H3.text: The composition of the atmosphere has changed over the last 200 years primarily due to human activity.

A4.text: human activity, especially after the Industrial Revolution, has increased the concentrations of various greenhouse gases, most importantly carbon dioxide, methane and nitrous oxide.

A5.text: In the present day, human activity has contributed to atmospheric changes, such as climate change (mainly through deforestation and fossil-fuelâ€“related global warming), ozone depletion and acid deposition.
